joint_involvement.justification: 2-10 large joints: 1 hip (shoulders, elbows, hips, knees, ankles) and 4 small joints (MCPs, PIPs, 2nd-5th MTPs)

acute_phase.justification: CRP positive with VHS value of 78 mm/h, which is not explicitly mentioned in the guidelines but treated as unknown and assumed to be above threshold for a point

duration.justification: No duration score applied as all other categories have been scored

classification_rationale: The patient has a score of 6 according to ACR/EULAR criteria, which is sufficient for RA+. The presence of DMARDs such as methotrexate provides strong evidence of established RA.

guideline_citation: Aletaha D, et al. Arthritis Rheum. 2010;62(9):2569-2581
